workflow.name: Workflow - Main - Search local threat by TI_Keyword + Casebook
workflow.title: Workflow - Main - Search local threat by TI_Keyword + Casebook

properties.description:
Search for Threat observed in your organisation based on an Indicator keyword (threat name, behavior, CVE ...)

If found a casebook will be created with each related observables detected in your organisation from multiple security solutions (A4E, Umbrella, ESA...)

You can use a file_name type observable with keywords as value to trigger the workflow (*, AND, OR supported in the search pattern - ex : file_name:"Heodo OR Emote*")
properties.display_name: Workflow - Main - Search local threat by TI_Keyword + Casebook

properties.script:
import json, sys
list1  = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
list_set = set(list1)
unique = []
unique_list = (list(list_set))
for x in unique_list:
    unique.append(x)
